reviewText: A few years ago I tried to purchase this video only to find out at check out it wouldn't be able to be shipped to where I live and I was so disappointed. Now I FINALLY got my hands on this DVD and it was worth the wait to get it!
Very informative and enjoyable to watch.
Love these National Geographic episodes.  Lots of good information on the subject - wish it showed thought the entire broadcast of that day and just not clips - my only issue with this film.

I bought this for my friends son's birthday.  When all the guests went home, it was the first thing he wanted to play with /  open,  This gift was right up his ally and the fact that I didn't have to run all over for it was great too.
GREAT, informative DVD.  I enjoyed it. Would recommend it to others who would like more info on the airship's story & tragedy.
